doc.str: An image retrieval system, including: an image input section for inputting a retrieval target image; an image data base for storing image data; a retrieval section for retrieving a plurality of images similar to said retrieval target image, by using a feature amount of said retrieval target image from said image data base; a filtering processing section for carrying out filtering processing using a whole image feature amount of another feature amount different from said feature amount of said retrieval target image about said plurality of images, to obtain a filtering result; and an outputting section for outputting said filtering result.
MATSUBARA, DAISUKE | HIROIKE, ATSUSHI | MORIMOTO, YASUTSUGU | AKIRA, NAOTO
Kokubunji, JP | Kawagoe, JP | Kodaira, JP | Kokubunji, JP
